title: Lead Front-end / Web Developer
description: Spearheaded the development of the company's flagship product, a web-based content management system for digital signage.

title: Front-end / Web Developer (contractor)
description: Agile development of front-end side of multi-app system with continuous delivery. Did overhaul of the web console in it's V2. Integrate & modify 3rd party apps & libraries.

title: UI/UX Front-end Developer
description: focused on developing web apps from client products, internal tools, web based interactions, mobile demos, nodejs APIs & concept prototypes; implementing specs & requirements including, but not limited to UI/UX mobile first designs, algorithms, visual interactions.

title: Freelance Interactive Developer
description: designed & developed interaction media through casual games and web applications; which includes robust programming, accessibility designs, visual graphics and overall user experience.
